original_text: He rained flesh also upon them as dust, and feathered fowls like as the sand of the sea:
korean_text: 먼지처럼 많은 고기를 비 같이 내리시고 나는 새를 바다의 모래 같이 내리셨도다

sentences.original_text: He rained flesh also upon them as dust,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들에게 먹을 고기도 먼지처럼 내렸고,

sentences.original_text: and feathered fowls like as the sand of the sea:
sentences.korean_translation: 깃털 있는 새들을 바다의 모래처럼 내렸습니다:
